docs.text: .pr polars-API: private calls to rust-polars Description .pr Original extendr bindings converted into pure functions Format An object of class environment of length 1. Usage .pr Examples #.pr$DataFrame$print() is an external function where self is passed as arg polars:::.pr$DataFrame$print(self = pl$DataFrame(iris)) polars:::print_env(.pr,".pr the collection of private method calls to rust-polars")
docs.title: `.pr`

docs.text: extendr_method_to_pure_functions extendr methods into pure functions Description self is a global of extendr wrapper methods this function copies the function into a new environment and modify formals to have a self argument Usage extendr_method_to_pure_functions(env) Arguments Argument Description env environment object output from extendr-wrappers.R classes Value env of pure function calls to rust
